Description: King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

Title: Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

Title: Red Dragon
Description: A retired F.B.I. Agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down The Tooth Fairy , a mysterious serial killer. Aiding him is imprisoned forensic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal The Cannibal Lecter.

Title: Hannibal
Description: Living in exile, Hannibal Lecter tries to reconnect with now disgraced F.B.I. Agent Clarice Starling, and finds himself a target for revenge from a powerful victim.

Title: Fracture
Description: An attorney, intent on climbing the career ladder toward success, finds an unlikely opponent in a manipulative criminal he is trying to prosecute.
